metadata.label: post
metadata.description: The client resource function to send HTTP POST requests to HTTP endpoints.

codedata.sourceCode: json res1 = check foodClient->/western/apples.post("western red apple");

metadata.label: message
metadata.description: An HTTP outbound request or any allowed payload

metadata.label: mediaType
metadata.description: The MIME type header of the request entity

metadata.label: targetType
metadata.description: HTTP response, `anydata` or stream of HTTP SSE, which is expected to be returned after data binding

metadata.label: New Connection
metadata.description:
The HTTP client provides the capability for initiating contact with a remote HTTP service. The API it
provides includes the functions for the standard HTTP methods forwarding a received request and sending requests
using custom HTTP verbs.

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local
